metadata.title: CVE-2022-21126 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The package com.github.samtools:htsjdk before 3.0.1 are vulnerable toCreation of Temporary File in Directory with Insecure Permissions due tothe createTempDir() function in util/IOUtil.java not checking for theexistence of the temporary directory before attempting to create it.

criterions.comment: htsjdk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
